info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:28PM EDT until August 10 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTY AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Courtland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Courtland around 755 PM EDT. Franklin, Sedley and Hunterdale around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Handsom, Berlin, Sebrell, Drewryville, Joyner, Shiloh, Story, Worrell and Capron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
